channel.title: Carquinez Bridge on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Carquinez Bridge on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Carquinez Bridge Toll Plaza
item.description: Approaching the Carquinez Bridge Toll Plaza on I-80 east. When this photo was taken in Fall 2010, the auto toll was $5.00. The Carquinez Bridge crosses the Carquinez Straits, through which the Sacramento and San Joaquin Delta empty into, before reaching the San Pablo Bay.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 26
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 26 - Crockett/Pomona St. The Carqinuez Bridge bridge over the Carquinez Straits begins here. The eastbound direction over the bridge pays tolls. All Fastrak users, use the left lane. Fastrak is a transponder system used to pay tolls in California.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 27
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 27 - Pomona St. After this exit the highway enters the Carquinez Bridge over the Carquinez Straits, which feeds the Sacramento and San Joaquin Rivers into the San Francisco Bay. Use the left lanes for Fastrak, an electronic tolling system used in California.
